name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.max.slowpeer.collect.nodes
description:
How many slow nodes we will collect for filtering out
    when choosing targets for blocks.

    It is ignored if dfs.namenode.block-placement-policy.exclude-slow-nodes.enabled is false.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.scheduler.heartbeat.interval-ms
description:
The interval in ms at which the MR AppMaster should send
    heartbeats to the ResourceManager

name: fs.s3a.list.version
description:
Select which version of the S3 SDK's List Objects API to use.  Currently
    support 2 (default) and 1 (older API).

name: dfs.datanode.transfer.socket.recv.buffer.size
description:
Socket receive buffer size for DataXceiver (receiving packets from client
    during block writing). This may affect TCP connection throughput.
    If it is set to zero or negative value, no buffer size will be set
    explicitly, thus enable tcp auto-tuning on some system.
    The default value is 0.

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.high.watermark
description: High watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.

name: seq.io.sort.mb
dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated
description:
The number of volumes that are allowed to
  fail before a datanode stops offering service. By default
  any volume failure will cause a datanode to shutdown.
  The value should be greater than or equal to -1 , -1 represents minimum
  1 valid volume.
